author: mwbrooks
msg: Update document header format for all Markdown files.
Previous, only the Object header file (e.g. device.md)
would start with H1. All methods, properties, and child objects
would then start with H2.
Now, each document starts with H1. This allows each document
to exist on its own - meaning each method, property, or child
object can be displayed independent of the parent object's header
This will be especially useful for joDoc indexing..

author: mwbrooks
msg: Update object header files to include a table of contents.
- Added header file for Accelerometer
- Added header file for Network
- Updated the rest
The idea is that the main header file is a landing page
for each Object. The header file can list the methods and
properties of the object, so that the reader can easily
understand what is available.

author: mwbrooks
msg: Change Markdown file extension from .markdown to .md.
This keeps the names shorter, which is nice since
most filenames are long to begin with.

author: andrew.lunny@nitobi.com
msg: removing unnecessary file

author: mwbrooks
msg: Remove stubbed API classes that are not documented.
The following classes are removed:
- Contacts
- File
- Map
- Media
- Orientation
- SMS
- Telephony
The classes are removed because it is not clear that they
are uniformly implemented across the majority of PhoneGap platforms.
Each class can be readded to the PhoneGap or platform-specific docs,
when we inventory all of the platforms classes and methods.
